name: Stability AI Image Generator
description: Generate images using Stability AI's API services with SD3 and save them to the filesystem
author: Robert Sigler

examples.prompt: Generate an image of a sunset over mountains
examples.call: {"prompt": "A beautiful sunset over majestic mountains, golden light, dramatic clouds, high quality, detailed", "model": "sd3-large", "seed": 42, "negative_prompt": "dark, gloomy, stormy, blur, low quality"}

examples.prompt: Create a cyberpunk street scene
examples.call: {"prompt": "Cyberpunk street scene, neon lights, holographic advertisements, rain-slicked streets, detailed, cinematic lighting", "model": "sd3-large", "negative_prompt": "day time, sunny, vintage, historical, black and white"}

examples.prompt: Draw a steampunk airship with the same seed as last time
examples.call: {"prompt": "Steampunk airship floating through clouds, brass and copper details, steam engines, Victorian aesthetic, highly detailed", "model": "sd3-large", "seed": 42, "negative_prompt": "modern, futuristic, digital technology"}

examples.prompt: Make a cartoon style fox using the medium model
examples.call: {"prompt": "Cute cartoon fox, big eyes, fluffy tail, vibrant colors, simple background, kawaii style", "model": "sd3-medium", "negative_prompt": "realistic, photographic, scary, aggressive"}

examples.prompt: Generate a realistic portrait without artifacts
examples.call: {"prompt": "Professional portrait, natural lighting, high quality, sharp details, neutral background", "model": "sd3-large", "negative_prompt": "watermarks, text, signature, blurry, distorted features, extra fingers, bad anatomy"}

examples.prompt: Create a fantasy landscape with dragons but no castles
examples.call: {"prompt": "Epic fantasy landscape, majestic dragons soaring through the sky, mystical forests, crystal formations, magical atmosphere", "model": "sd3-large", "negative_prompt": "castles, medieval buildings, man-made structures, urban elements"}

examples.prompt: Make a quick concept art using the turbo model
examples.call: {"prompt": "Sci-fi vehicle concept art, sleek design, floating hover car, speed lines", "model": "sd3-large-turbo", "negative_prompt": "detailed background, complex scenes, multiple vehicles"}

examples.prompt: Generate a consistent character design with seed
examples.call: {"prompt": "Character design of a young wizard, magical robes, holding a staff, detailed costume, fantasy style", "model": "sd3-large", "seed": 12345, "negative_prompt": "modern clothing, technology, urban background"}

examples.prompt: Create food photography without any text
examples.call: {"prompt": "Professional food photography, gourmet pasta dish, steam rising, fresh ingredients, shallow depth of field, studio lighting", "model": "sd3-large", "negative_prompt": "text, watermarks, labels, menu, hands, people, utensils"}

examples.prompt: Generate architectural visualization without people
examples.call: {"prompt": "Modern architectural visualization, minimalist house design, floor-to-ceiling windows, natural materials, dramatic lighting", "model": "sd3-large", "negative_prompt": "people, vehicles, animals, clutter, urban environment, neighboring buildings"}

examples.prompt: Draw a product render with specific seed
examples.call: {"prompt": "Minimal product photography of a smartwatch, floating in white space, studio lighting, high-end commercial look", "model": "sd3-large", "seed": 98765, "negative_prompt": "hands, arms, people, background elements, text, logos"}

examples.prompt: Make abstract art without recognizable objects
examples.call: {"prompt": "Abstract art, flowing colors, geometric patterns, dynamic composition, vibrant energy", "model": "sd3-large", "negative_prompt": "recognizable objects, faces, figures, symbols, text"}

examples.prompt: Generate a photorealistic mountain landscape at sunset
examples.call: {"prompt": "Majestic mountain range at sunset, golden light, dramatic clouds, photorealistic style, high detail", "model": "sd3.5-large", "seed": 42, "negative_prompt": "cartoon, low quality, blurry, dark"}

examples.prompt: Create a futuristic cityscape with flying cars
examples.call: {"prompt": "Futuristic cityscape at night, neon lights, holographic billboards, flying cars, cyberpunk style", "model": "sd3.5-large", "negative_prompt": "historical, rural, daytime"}

examples.prompt: Generate an underwater scene with coral and tropical fish
examples.call: {"prompt": "Vibrant coral reef, colorful tropical fish, clear blue water, sunbeams penetrating the surface", "model": "sd3.5-medium", "seed": 123, "negative_prompt": "boats, humans, above water"}

examples.prompt: Create a portrait of a fantasy character
examples.call: {"prompt": "Portrait of an elven warrior, intricate armor, flowing silver hair, ethereal glow, fantasy art style", "model": "sd3.5-large", "negative_prompt": "modern clothing, urban background"}

examples.prompt: Generate a still life painting in the style of Dutch masters
examples.call: {"prompt": "Still life with fruits, flowers, and a ornate vase, chiaroscuro lighting, rich colors, Dutch Golden Age painting style", "model": "sd3.5-large", "seed": 789, "negative_prompt": "modern, abstract, bright lighting"}

examples.prompt: Create a quick concept art of a sci-fi vehicle
examples.call: {"prompt": "Sleek futuristic hover bike, streamlined design, glowing energy lines, speed blur background", "model": "sd3.5-large-turbo", "negative_prompt": "old-fashioned, bulky, stationary"}

examples.prompt: Generate an abstract representation of the four seasons
examples.call: {"prompt": "Abstract quadriptych representing spring, summer, autumn, and winter, vibrant colors, flowing shapes", "model": "sd3.5-medium", "seed": 456, "negative_prompt": "realistic, photographic, specific objects"}

examples.prompt: Create a detailed macro photograph of an insect
examples.call: {"prompt": "Extreme close-up of a colorful butterfly wing, intricate scales, dewdrops, soft background bokeh", "model": "sd3.5-large", "negative_prompt": "full body, wide angle, human elements"}

examples.prompt: Generate a surreal dreamscape
examples.call: {"prompt": "Surreal landscape with floating islands, upside-down waterfalls, giant clock gears in the sky, Salvador Dali inspired", "model": "sd3.5-large", "seed": 101, "negative_prompt": "realistic, ordinary, logical physics"}

examples.prompt: Create a vintage travel poster
examples.call: {"prompt": "Vintage style travel poster of Paris, Eiffel Tower, bold colors, art deco design, 1920s aesthetic", "model": "sd3.5-medium", "negative_prompt": "modern, photorealistic, black and white"}

prompt.description: Text description of the image to generate

model.description: Stability AI model to use (sd3.5-large, sd3.5-large-turbo, sd3.5-medium, sd3-medium, sd3-large, sd3-large-turbo)

negative_prompt.description: Keywords describing what you do NOT want in the generated image
